Text: I see a few people have downloaded it already. Please help me seed this. I cannot leave my computer on all of the time.
Oh and buy the book! It is a beautiful hardback worthy of any gamers library.

nice thanks, I will add this to my next release but will try to get a few more books first

Not sure if you missed it but Grey Wolf was included in the 1.2 release.
Yeah I found them. Thank you much sir! I'll keep an eye out for Devil's Charge.
